unnormalised: Borem, konnainch tor lokhsankhya gananchi noveen aamkaadaanchi mahiti vichaarli, hoi? Tor tayyar ravat, kiteak ankde ek Bollywood nachache scene-von wilder aasat! Bharataachi lokhsankhya 2021 che lokhsankhyache gananet 1.4 billion meren pauleli dista. Hoi, te 140 cr, lokancho. Dhortat soglle vastunche dhaagyanche bhartta! Te sangtat ki vadhicho daar thodso 1.1% meren kamin zala... zaite zann baallam zaitale thorun thakun gelet? Kheddicho! (Zaitar tori.)
normalised: Borem, konnem-i ekhdea xevottchea zonogononnechea ankddeanvixim vicharlem, hã? Mhonnllear, toiar zaat, kiteak ankdde Bollywood-achea nachachea scene-itleax-i ranamoll-aachea asat! Bharotachi loksonkhea dison aili ki don hozar ani ekvisachea zonogononnekhatir ek point char billion-acher paulichi. Hoi, te zale ek xem ani challis crore, lokanno. Soglleakuch line-a bhitor ubhe ravtale tumi monant haddat! Tannim mhonnle ki vadhichem promann thoddem koddun ek point ek percent zalea...kiteak atam dogui babieo korcheak kanttall ailem zat! Fuddar marata! (Veglleach).

unnormalised: Sarkaari report azun wait kortat, tbh. Experts thorun thoran tori mahatvache chalanancho anuman kadtata. Toruch distat, zaite zann shaheran vhalanvtaat. Delhi, Mumbai, Bangalore – te bharelle aasat! Tya bhagean samadhanache ghar melovp Chandni Chowkache divaleche dhekhant parki melovpevhant katin aasa. Likhneencho daar pun vathla, dista tor 77.7% aasa. Jechon zaite lokk manzo Quora utrancho vaachoon shakta, hoi na? Win-win!
normalised: Sorkari report atam-ui upekhik aasa, satyek zait mhonnllear. Punnh tankanchea nallianak zannkar bhov ruchichim dhuvan ubartat. Zoxem dison ailem ki khub lok xeherak jaitat. Delhi, Mumbai, Bangalore – te purnn zavnk sodtat! Thoin ekhdea borea ghorak mellovnk Chandni Chowk-ant Diwali-che vellar parking zaga mellovnk kitli trass zata tetlean vatik aasa. Saaxarota-chem promann-ui vaddoilem, thodde-khadde settattar point satt percent zat mhunn dison ailem. Mhonnllear khub lok mhoji Quora-chi hasovpachea javabon vachoita, hã? Zikh-zikh!

unnormalised: Punn seriously, he ankdenche zaite motte prabhav asat khaarzan samagriyecho vantar korunk infrastructure vathovpak. Sarkaari lokkancho khavpak, shikson divpak, nokri divpak soglle dyaan divchea poddta. Dhortat, dunyaache motte kutumbacho potluck yojnkortat... konn yetat te kadkaadaanche nimane momentan sangatat! Konnakai dabav na, hoi na? Ani Bharataachi 65% lokhsankhya 35 vorsanche tunken aasa. Makai vhoddlo dista...
normalised: Punn satyek zait mhonnllear, hhea ankddeanchem porinnam soglem zata jitlem resource-anche vachnnuk korcho, infrastrukture-achem vikasacho. G-O-V-T-ek mellovnk zai mhonnllear koxem khavo, xikovn, ani nokoreo he soglea lokaank denvk zai. Tumim monant haddat soglea vhoddlea familly-ak potluck-achem niyojon korta...xevottchea veallaank kitli loka yevnchem mhunn tankam vollok naslele astam! Koddun dharonn nã, hã? Ani saxtti pachaas percent Bharotache lok sonkhea teentris varsha kanttichea khal aasa. Mhaka tor guddlo disa lagta...

unnormalised: Kitekai, hi saranshi aasa. Ankde, ankde soglli kade, pun punyache thembe piitanaak (nirmal nillancho, amche nillancho kaminecho mhoinno). Seriously, amche aavdee divt Bharataach kitlem bhinn ani jaast lokhsankhya aasa. Te aswast, te bhaarilele, pun te dhormik aanandi aasa, hoi na? Ani yaad dukhat, he ankde 2021 che lokhsankhya gananche. Dusrem 2031 che, zaite surprises diitle!
normalised: Kitem-ui asat, hacho arth aasa. Ankdde, ankdde zaga zagain aasa, punnh eka bhulteo udkak dhupank nam (nhirmoll udok mhonnllear, amche udok unnem zalem mhonnllear. Umh...!) Satyek zait mhonnllear, apnni soglleamni tori dhadhekhanch bhov bhedbhav-an ani loksonkhea-n Bharot kitlo motto aasa tankam kortalem. Tem asunt-pasunt asa, bhirntt bhirntt aasa, punnh tem bhov bhov borem-ui aasa, mhunn nam? Ani lokanno ugddas korunchet jait ki hhe ankdde don hozar ani ekvisachea zonogononechya ankdde asat. Dusrem ek don hozar ani teenttisachea bhitor, tenne tumi bhov bhedaam polleucheak melltaa!
